Literature.Title: A Systematic Study of the Stability, Safety, and Efficacy of the de novo Designed Antimicrobial Peptide PepD2 and Its Modified Derivatives Against Acinetobacter baumannii
Literature.Author: Chen SP, Chen EH, Yang SY, Kuo PS, Jan HM, Yang TC, Hsieh MY, Lee KT, Lin CH, Chen RP

Literature.Title: De Novo Design of Antimicrobial Peptides With a Special Charge Pattern and Their Application in Combating Plant Pathogens.
Literature.Author: Chen EHL, Weng CW, Li YM, Wu MC, Yang CC, Lee KT, Chen RPY, Cheng CP

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Rat erythrocytes:3.15% Hemolysis=256 µg/ml,Human embryonic kidney HEK293 cells:IC50=68.1 µg/ml
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC 17978(MIC=8µg/ml),Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC 17978(MBC=8µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus BCRC 10777(MIC=16µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus BCRC 10777(MBC=32µg/ml),Staphylococcus epidermidis ATCC 14990(MIC=16µg/ml),Staphylococcus epidermidis ATCC 14990(MBC=32µg/ml),Escherichia coli DH5alpha(MIC=8µg/ml),Escherichia coli DH5alpha(MBC=16µg/ml),Xanthomonas euvesicatoria(MIC=4µg/ml),Xanthomonas euvesicatoria(MBC=4µg/ml),Xanthomonas campestris pv. campestris(MIC=2µg/ml),Xanthomonas campestris pv. campestris(MBC=2µg/ml),Xanthomonas oryzae pv. oryzae(MIC=4µg/ml),Xanthomonas oryzae pv. oryzae(MBC=4µg/ml),Agrobacterium tumefaciens C58C1(MIC=2µg/ml),Agrobacterium tumefaciens C58C1(MBC=2µg/ml),Pectobacterium carotovorum subsp. carotovorum(MIC=8µg/ml),Pectobacterium carotovorum subsp. carotovorum(MBC=16µg/ml),Pseudomonas syringae pv. tomato DC3000(MIC=8µg/ml),Pseudomonas syringae pv. tomato DC3000(MBC=16µg/ml),Pseudomonas syringae pv. syringae(MIC=8µg/ml),Pseudomonas syringae pv. syringae(MBC=16µg/ml),Pectobacterium carotovorum subsp. carotovorum(MIC=8µg/ml),Pectobacterium carotovorum subsp. carotovorum(MBC=16µg/ml),Dickeya dadantii(MIC=32µg/ml),Ralstonia solanacearum(no activity data),Botrytis cinerea(no activity data),Colletotrichum gloeosporioides(no activity data)
